PetCares.name: Pet Cares
PetCares.help: Feeding pets and relative daily quests

TDMBGPOP.name: TDMBGPOP
TDMBGPOP.help:
The Discarded Magical Blue Grundo Plushie of Prosperity
https://www.jellyneo.net/?go=tdmbgpop

VoidsWithin.name: Voids Within
VoidsWithin.help: Auto dispatch volunteer to the Void's Within hospital

NextRun.name: Next Run
NextRun.help:
Updated automatically after completing the task to set next scheduled run, typically not manually modified
However you can force immediate scheduling if you clear this text field

ServerUpdate.name: Server Update
ServerUpdate.help: Series of server refresh time(s) as to when this task will next run, this is automatically converted to respective time zone, generally do not need to modify

SaveError.name: Record Exception
SaveError.help: Records exception and log into directory for review or sharing

ScreenshotLength.name: Record Screenshot(s)
ScreenshotLength.help: Number of screenshots saved when exception occurs

OnePushConfig.name: Error notify config
OnePushConfig.help:
When Alas cannot handle exception, send a message through Onepush. Configuration document: 
https://github.com/LmeSzinc/AzurLaneAutoScript/wiki/Onepush-configuration-%5BEN%5D

ScreenshotInterval.name: Take Screenshots Every X Second(s)
ScreenshotInterval.help: Minimum interval between 2 screenshots, limited in 0.1 ~ 0.3, can help reduce CPU on high-end PCs

CombatScreenshotInterval.name: Take Screenshots Every X Second(s) In Combat
CombatScreenshotInterval.help: Minimum interval between 2 screenshots, limited in 0.1 ~ 1.0, can help reduce CPU during battle

WhenTaskQueueEmpty.name: When Task Queue is Empty
WhenTaskQueueEmpty.help: Close AL when there are no pending tasks, can help reduce CPU

MaxConcurrentInstance.name: Max Concurrent Instances
MaxConcurrentInstance.help:
Max number of running instances at same time, 0 for unlimited.
Using this option can prevent freezing your PC if you have multiple profiles.

_info.name: Playwright
_info.help: Restart is required after changing these settings

CleanPagesOnStart.name: Clean Redundant Tabs
CleanPagesOnStart.help: When start the browser, only left first 3 tabs and close all others

RemoteDebuggingAddress.name: Remote Debugging Address
RemoteDebuggingAddress.help: Address for remote debugging, ignored if using dedicated browser

LaunchDedicatedBrowser.name: Launch Dedicated Browser
LaunchDedicatedBrowser.help:
Launch a dedicated browser every time.
If disabled, Nechouli will start from your OS installed browser, good if you want manual interactions.

AutoAcceptDialog.name: Auto Accept Dialog
AutoAcceptDialog.help: When confirm dialog appears, automatically accept instead dismiss

UseDefaultProfile.name: Use Default Profile
UseDefaultProfile.help:
Use your system default profile, such as your login cookies and settings.
Require disabled if you want to run multiple Nechouli instances at the same time.

CustomUserAgent.name: Custom User Agent
CustomUserAgent.help: Custom user agent string for this profile, leave empty to use default browser user agent

ExtensionDirectory.name: Extension Directory
ExtensionDirectory.help: Path to folder contains browser extensions

ExtensionNames.name: Extensions
ExtensionNames.help: Name of extensions to load, separated by line

MinNpKeep.name: Min NP carrying
MinNpKeep.help: Will not spent NP if you're carrying less than this value

JellyNeoExpiry.name: JellyNeo cache expiry
JellyNeoExpiry.help: Effective hours of JellyNeo item search cache

TaskSoftTerminationTime.name: Task termination delay
TaskSoftTerminationTime.help: Seconds to terminate task after it's done

DepositThreshold.name: Deposit Threshold
DepositThreshold.help: When your NP is above this value, it will be deposited into the bank

MaxDeposit.name: Max Deposit
MaxDeposit.help: Maximum amount of NP to deposit into the bank once above the threshold

FeedBlacklist.name: Feeding Blacklist
FeedBlacklist.help: List of names of items that will not be fed to pets, separated by line, supports regex. Nechouli will never feeds diseased items.

PlayBlackList.name: Toys Blacklist
PlayBlackList.help: Same logic as FeedBlacklist, but for toys. Nechouli will never plays with toys with `openable` effect, such as some pet-altering magical toys.

GroomBlackList.name: Grooming Blacklist
GroomBlackList.help: Same logic as FeedBlacklist, but for grooming. Nechouli will never grooms pets with `openable` effect.

MaxFeedValue.name: Max Item Value
MaxFeedValue.help: Upper market price limit (NP) of a food item the script is allowed to feed.

MaxFeedLevel.name: Max Feed Level
MaxFeedLevel.help: Feeding pet when its hunger status is below this level.

PurchaseCheapItems.name: Purchase Cheap Items
PurchaseCheapItems.help: Allow purchase cheap items (< 1000 NP) when calling restocking task to complete daily quest.

ActiveRestocking.name: Active Restocking
ActiveRestocking.help: Actively restock items from shops, instead being called by other tasks.

ActiveRestockInterval.name: Active Restocking Interval
ActiveRestockInterval.help: Interval in minutes between active restocking runs.

EnableCaptchaDebug.name: Enable Captcha Debug
EnableCaptchaDebug.help: If enabled, will preserve captcha images in `.captcha/` directory.

RestockPerShop.name: Restock Per Shop
RestockPerShop.help: How many items to buy in each shop, ignored if no goods are available

MinProfit.name: Min Profit
MinProfit.help: Minimum profit to buy the item

MaxShopStock.name: Max Shop Stock
MaxShopStock.help: Maximum number of items to keep in your shop, will not buy if your shop already has this many items

MaxCost.name: Max Cost
MaxCost.help: Maximum cost to buy an item

ImmediateProfit.name: Immediate Profit
ImmediateProfit.help: Bypass bargain if item's profit is above this value

ShopList.name: Shop List
ShopList.help:
List of shops to restock from, separated by comma.
For list of shops, see https://www.jellyneo.net/?go=shopsdirectory

BargainStrategyScript.name: Bargain Strategy Script
BargainStrategyScript.help:
!!!NEVER PASTE UNKNOWN SCRIPTS HERE!!!
This script will be executed to determine the price of an item in your shop, it should return a number. Do not touch this if you have no idea what you're doing.

KeepInventorySlot.name: Keep Inventory Slot
KeepInventorySlot.help: When your inventory has fewer free slots than this, the task will run to free up inventory space

DepositValue.name: Deposit Value
DepositValue.help: Item will force to put in safe deposit box if its market price is above this value

RestockProfit.name: Restock Profit
RestockProfit.help: Minimum profit to restock this item to your shop

WithdrawTill.name: Withdraw Till
WithdrawTill.help: Withdraw all NP from shop till

CategoryKeeps.name: Category Keeps
CategoryKeeps.help:
Number of items of a category to keep in inventory, separated by line. Format: `category:number` 
e.g. `food:10` will keep 10 food items in inventory.
 For list of categories, see source `module/db/models/neoitem.py#category`

PriceStrategyScript.name: Price Strategy Script
PriceStrategyScript.help:
!!!NEVER PASTE UNKNOWN SCRIPTS HERE!!!
This script will be executed to determine the price of an item in your shop, it should return a number. Do not touch this if you have no idea what you're doing.

ForceDepositList.name: Force Deposit List
ForceDepositList.help: Name/regex of items to force deposit into safe deposit box, separated by line.

DepositBlacklist.name: Deposit Blacklist
DepositBlacklist.help: Name/regex of items to blacklist from being deposited into safe deposit box, separated by line.

DonateNameList.name: Donate Name List
DonateNameList.help: Exact name of items to donate, separated by line.

SellProfitRatio.name: Sell Profit Ratio
SellProfitRatio.help:
Sell the shares when their profit is above this ratio,
e.g. 20 = 20%, sell when 18 if bought at 15

EnableActivePriceUpdate.name: Enable Active Price Update
EnableActivePriceUpdate.help: Update market price of items in your shop and cache db by searching in Shop Wizard.

PriceUpdateInterval.name: Price Update Interval
PriceUpdateInterval.help: Interval in minutes running price update task.

PriceUpdateBatchSize.name: Price Update Batch Size
PriceUpdateBatchSize.help: Number of items to update in each batch.

PriceUpdateRescans.name: Price Update Rescans
PriceUpdateRescans.help: Number of times to rescan in shop wizard for same item when not finding lower price.

ShopWizardRequests.name: Shop Wizard Requests
ShopWizardRequests.help: Requests made to Shop Wizard from tasks, will block if you're on fairy quest

BuyFeeFromPlayers.name: Purchase fee from players
BuyFeeFromPlayers.help: Purchase item from players (via SW) to pay the training price, if you don't have enough in SDB

Config.name: Pet Training Config
Config.help:
Configuration for pet training, separated by line.
Format: `PetName:Academy:TargetLv:TargetStr:TargetDef:TargetMov:TargetHp`
Example: `Fluffy:pirate:40:80:80:80:80`.
Academy can be `pirate`, `island`, or `ninja`.

PendingTrainingFee.name: Pending Training Fee
PendingTrainingFee.help: Pets in course but haven't paid the training fee yet.

DelayForDailyFeed.name: Delay For Daily Feed
DelayForDailyFeed.help: Delay the task until feeding pet daily quest is completed (dispatched pets are always bloated)

AvailablePetsCount.name: Number of Available Pets
AvailablePetsCount.help: Number of pets available for dispatching in hospital. Leave 0 for auto-detect but sometimes will bugged due to js render lag.

DailyQuestRestockTimesLeft.name: Daily Quest Restock Counter
DailyQuestRestockTimesLeft.help: Numbers left to complete 'purchase items from shops' daily quest

DailyQuestFeedTimesLeft.name: Daily Quest Feed Counter
DailyQuestFeedTimesLeft.help: Numbers left to complete 'feed pets' daily quest

Toast.DisableTranslateMode: Click here to disable translate mode
Toast.ClickToUpdate: New update available, click here to update

AddAlas.FileExist: A config with the same name exists, please choose another one
AddAlas.InvalidChar: Config name cannot contain any of the following characters: .\/:*?"<>|

Update.UpdateWait: Waiting for all alas complete current task
Update.UpdateFailed: Update failed. Logs can be found in ./log/*_gui.txt
Update.Author: Author
Update.DisabledWarn: Updater module is disabled. You need to manually restart Alas to update

Remote.NotRunning: Not running, server disconnected or offline
Remote.NotEnable: Disabled, set webui password in deploy.yaml and enable remote access
Remote.SSHNotInstall: No SSH command in your system. Please refer to the tutorial to download or install one
